section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using StudyFrontier's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Services Provided
section2.content: StudyFrontier provides educational consulting services to help students apply to universities in the United States. Our services include guidance on university selection, application support, and visa preparation. We do not guarantee admission to any institution or visa approval.

section3.title: 3. No Guarantees
section3.content: We provide professional guidance and support, but we cannot guarantee university admission, scholarship awards, or visa approval. Educational outcomes depend on many factors including the student's academic qualifications, application quality, and institutional decisions.

section4.title: 4. Client Responsibilities
section4.content: Clients are responsible for providing accurate information, meeting deadlines, and actively participating in the application process. Failure to provide accurate information or meet deadlines may affect the outcome of applications.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content, materials, and resources provided by StudyFrontier remain our intellectual property. Clients may not reproduce, distribute, or use our materials for commercial purposes without written permission.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: StudyFrontier is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services. Our liability is limited to the amount of fees paid for services.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us via WhatsApp or email.

section1.title: 1. Consultation Services
section1.content: Initial consultations are provided free of charge. If you are not satisfied with our initial consultation, there is no obligation to proceed with paid services.

section2.title: 2. Service Packages
section2.content: Refunds for service packages are handled on a case-by-case basis. If services have not yet been delivered, you may be eligible for a full or partial refund depending on the stage of the process.

section3.title: 3. Work Already Completed
section3.content: Refunds do not apply to work that has already been completed. This includes consultations held, documents reviewed, applications submitted, or other services already provided.

section4.title: 4. Refund Request Process
section4.content: To request a refund, contact us via WhatsApp or email with your service details and reason for the request. We will review your request within 5-7 business days and respond with our decision.

section5.title: 5. Processing Time
section5.content: Approved refunds will be processed within 14 business days and returned using the original payment method. Please note that bank processing times may vary.

contact.title: Questions About Refunds?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our refund policy, please contact us via WhatsApp or email. We're here to help resolve any concerns.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
section2.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality, analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site (via Vercel Analytics), and preference cookies to remember your language selection. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies.

section3.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
section3.content: We use Vercel Analytics to understand site performance. These analytics are privacy-friendly and do not track personal information. No data is shared with third parties for advertising purposes.

section4.title: 4. Managing Cookies
section4.content: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website, including language preferences.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our cookie usage, please contact us via WhatsApp or email.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: StudyFrontier was founded with a clear mission: to provide honest, transparent, and effective guidance to Moroccan students seeking to study in the United States. We believe every student deserves access to quality education, and we're here to make that journey smoother and more achievable.

value1.title: Honesty & Transparency
value1.content: We provide realistic expectations and honest guidance. No false promises, no hidden fees—just straightforward advice you can trust.

value2.title: Student-Centered
value2.content: Your success is our success. We tailor our guidance to your unique situation, goals, and aspirations.

value3.title: Excellence
value3.content: We maintain the highest standards in everything we do, from application guidance to ongoing support.

reason1.title: Local Expertise, Global Reach
reason1.content: We understand both the Moroccan education system and US university requirements, giving you the best of both worlds.

reason2.title: Proven Track Record
reason2.content: Our students have been accepted to top universities across the United States. We know what works.

reason3.title: Personalized Support
reason3.content: Every student is unique. We provide customized guidance tailored to your academic profile and career goals.
